title: Create a Performance Dashboard
description: An analyst needs to create a new live dashboard in a tool like Google Data Studio to track key campaign metrics.

tasks.description: Connect the dashboarding tool to the necessary data sources (Google Ads, Google Analytics).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully establishes the data connections.

tasks.description: Create visualizations (scorecards, time-series charts, tables) for key metrics like Spend, Clicks, and Conversions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds a dashboard with clear and relevant charts.

tasks.description: Add filters to the dashboard to allow users to view data by date range and campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds interactive controls to the dashboard.
